Key Match Events: Roland Sallai scored the only goal for Hungary in the 32nd minute
Virgil van Dijk was sent off for Netherlands in the 79th minute
Denzel Dumfries scored the equalizer for Netherlands in the 83rd minute
Post-Match Reflections: Netherlands had 84% of the ball in the first half but could not create many clear chances
Hungary scored with their only attempt on target in the first half
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zsolt Nagy was named man of the match for Hungary

The result leaves Netherlands second in Group 3 of League A, boasting five points from their opening three matches, while Hungary sit in third spot, having collected two points from their first three matches
Others: The match was played at the Puskas Arena in Budapest, Hungary
